info.header: Nokia Siemens FlexiNG NG3.0;NG2.1;NG2.0;NG10CD8;NG10CD6;NG10CD4;NG10CD2 Session_profile SSPROF measurement dump
info.csv_title: Nokia Siemens FlexiNG NG3.0;NG2.1;NG2.0;NG10CD8;NG10CD6;NG10CD4;NG10CD2 Session_profile SSPROF measurement dump

kpi_info.title: period_duration
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_TC_CONV
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions using the conversational traffic class. UPDATED: Updated when an active session is created using conversational traffic class.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_TC_STRM
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions using streaming traffic class. The index is stat collection index stored in session profile. UPDATED: Updated when the session using streaming traffic class has been activated.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_TC_INTACT_THP1
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions which are using QoS class Interactive and Traffic Handling Priority 1. The counter index is an index of a session profile for which session profile statistics collection is enabled. UPDATED: Updated when QoS class Interactive and Traffic Class Priority 1 are associated with a session.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_TC_INTACT_THP2
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions using the interactive traffic class Traffic Handling Priority 2 (THP2) for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a session starts/stops using the interactive traffic class Traffic Handling Priority 2 (THP2).

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_TC_INTACT_THP3
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions that belong to the interactive traffic class with the traffic handling priority 3 (THP3) for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a session that belong to the interactive traffic class THP3 is created or deleted.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_TC_BGRD
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the amount of active sessions that use the background traffic class. UPDATED: Updated when the number of sessions that use the background traffic class changes.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_TC_CONV
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active bearers using the conversational traffic class. The index is a stat collection index which is stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when an active bearer is created or modified/updated to use the conversational traffic class. Decremented when an active bearer is deleted or modified/updated to use some other QoS class.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_TC_STRM
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active bearers using the streaming traffic class. The index is a stat collection index which is stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when an active bearer is created or modified/updated to use the streaming traffic class. Decremented when an active bearer is deleted or modified/updated to use some other QoS class.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_TC_INTACT_THP1
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active bearers using the interactive traffic class with Traffic Handling Priority 1 (THP1). The index is a stat collection index which is stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when an active bearer is created or modified/updated to use the QoS class Interactive and Traffic Class Priority 1 (THP1). Decremented when an active bearer is deleted or modified/updated to use some other QoS class.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_TC_INTACT_THP2
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active bearers using the interactive traffic class with Traffic Handling Priority 2 (THP2). The index is a stat collection index which is stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when an active bearer is created or modified/updated to use the QoS class Interactive and Traffic Class Priority 2 (THP2). Decremented when an active bearer is deleted or modified/updated to use some other QoS class.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_TC_INTACT_THP3
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active bearers using the interactive traffic class with Traffic Handling Priority 3 (THP3). The index is stat a collection index which is stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when an active bearer is created or modified/updated to use the QoS class Interactive and Traffic Class Priority 3 (THP3). Decremented when an active bearer is deleted or modified/updated to use some other QoS class.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_TC_BGRD
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active bearers using the background traffic class. The index is a stat collection index whitch is stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when an active bearer is created or modified/updated to use the background traffic class. Decremented when an active bearer is deleted or modified/updated to use some other QoS class.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_RAT_UNKNOWN
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the amount of active sessions using an unknown radio access type. UPDATED: This gauge is incremented when a session creation message containing a radio access type other than GERAN, UTRAN, E-UTRAN, eHRPD, HRPD or WLAN is received or if the received session creation does not contain the radio access type information element. It is also incremented when a previously established session with the radio access type GERAN, UTRAN, E-UTRAN eHRPD, HRPD, or WLAN is updated with a session update message containing a radio access type other than GERAN, UTRAN, E-UTRAN, eHRPD, HRPD or WLAN. This gauge is decremented when a previously established session with an unknown radio access type is deactivated or updated with a session update message containing radio access type GERAN; UTRAN, E-UTRAN, eHRPD, HRPD, or WLAN.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_RAT_2G
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the amount of active sessions using the GERAN radio access type. UPDATED: This gauge is incremented when a session creation or session update message containing radio access type GERAN is received. This gauge is decremented when a session update message containing a radio access type other than GERAN is received or when a previously established session with the GERAN radio access type is deactivated.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_RAT_3G
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the amount of active sessions using the UTRAN radio access type. UPDATED: This gauge is incremented when a session creation or session update message containing radio access type UTRAN is received. This gauge is decremented when a session update message containing a radio access type other than UTRAN is received or when a previously established session with the UTRAN radio access type is deactivated.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_IP_DYN
kpi_info.use: Active sessions using dynamic IP addresses. The index is stat collection index stored in session profile.Note that in a high availability deployment this gauge is synchronized between the active and standby nodes, and the synchronized values summed up for a node pair indicate double values.UPDATED: Updated when session is activated or deactivated

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_SESS_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful session activations for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a session is successfully activated.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed session activations. UPDATED: Updated when a session activation fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_IPV4_DYN
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions using dynamic IPv4 addresses. The counter index is an index of a session profile for which session profile statistics collection is enabled. UPDATED: Updated when a session using a dynamic IPv4 address is created or deleted.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_SESS_ACT_SAE_GW
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful SAE-GW session activations for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a SAE-GW session is successfully activated.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_ACT_SAE_GW
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed SAE-GW session activations. UPDATED: Updated when a SAE-GW session activation fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_SESS_DEACT_GGSN_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful GGSN initiated session deactivations. UPDATED: Updated when the GGSN initiated session deactivation is done successfully.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_DEACT_GGSN_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed GGSN initiated session deactivations. UPDATED: Updated only if the deactivation procedure is canceled before completion. This usually means that an internal error has occured (for example; a critical database search fails; procedure timer expires; and so on). Thus the counter is never incremented because of an error response from an external network element or failure in contacting one. When the counter is incremented because of an internal failure; the session is always deactivated. This happens by force also in failure cases and no sessions are left hanging.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_SESS_DEACT_GGSN_TERM
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successfull GGSN terminated session deactivations for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a GGSN successfully terminates the session deactivations.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_DEACT_GGSN_TERM
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed GGSN terminated session deactivations. UPDATED: Updated when an error occurs during session deactivation.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_SESS_MOD
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful session modifications for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a session is successfully modified.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_MOD
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed session modifications for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a session modification fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_BEAR_DEACT_GGSN_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful GGSN-initiated bearer deactivations. UPDATED: Updated when the GGSN-initiated bearer deactivation has been done successfully. When teardown flag is set all bearers update the counter.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_BEAR_DEACT_GGSN_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed GGSN-initiated bearer deactivations. UPDATED: Updated only if the deactivation procedure is canceled before completion. This usually means that an internal error has occured (for example; a critical database search fails; a procedure timer expires; and so on). Thus the counter is never incremented because of an error response from an external network element or failure in contacting one. When the counter is incremented because of an internal failure the bearer is always deactivated. This happens by force also in failure cases and no bearers are left hanging. When the teardown flag is set all bearers update the counter.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_BEAR_DEACT_NG_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful NG-initiated bearer deactivations.Updated: Updated when the NG-initiated bearer deactivation has been done successfully. When a PDN connection is deactivated all bearers of the PDN connection update the counter.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_BEAR_DEACT_NG_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed NG-initiated bearer deactivations. Updated: Updated only if the deactivation procedure is canceled before completion.This usually means that an internal error has occured (for example; a critical database search fails; a procedure timer expires; and so on). Thus the counter is never incremented because of an error response from an external network element or failure in contacting one. When the counter is incremented because of an internal failure the bearer is always deactivated. This happens by force also in failure cases and no bearers are left hanging. When a PDN connection is deactivated all bearers of the PDN connection updated the counter.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_BEAR_DEACT_GGSN_TERM
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successfull GGSN-terminated bearer deactivations for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a GGSN successfully terminates the bearer deactivations. When the teardown flag is set all bearers update the counter.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_BEAR_DEACT_GGSN_TERM
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed GGSN-terminated bearer deactivations. UPDATED: Updated when an error occurs during bearer deactivation. When the teardown flag is set all bearers update the counter.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_BEAR_MOD
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful access initiated bearer modifications for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when an access initiated bearer modification has been done successfully.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_BEAR_MOD
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed access initiated bearer modifications for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when an access initiatied bearer modification fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_RAT_4G
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the amount of active sessions using the E-UTRAN radio access type. UPDATED: This gauge is incremented when a session creation or session update message containing radio access type UTRAN is received. This gauge is decremented when a session update message containing a radio access type other than UTRAN is received or when an previously established session with the UTRAN radio access type is deactivated.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_DIA_GX_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed Diameter Gx sessions for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a Diameter Gx active session fails after a CCR-Initial message (CCR-I) has been sent to the PCRF.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_DIA_GXC_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter is obsolete and not updated. It is replaced by counter m3046c0011. This counter contains the number of failed Diameter Gxc active sessions for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a Diameter Gxc active session fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_BEAR_DIA_SESS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed bearer Diameter sessions. UPDATED: Updated when a Diameter session fails after a CCR-Update message (CCR-U) has been sent to the PCRF.

kpi_info.title: SM_DIA_GXC_SESS_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter is obsolete and not updated. It is replaced by counter m3046c0012. This gauge contains the number of active diameter Gxc sessions stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Updated when an active diameter Gxc session stored in the session profile.

kpi_info.title: SM_DIA_GX_SESS_ACT
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active Diameter Gx sessions stored in session profile. UPDATED: Updated when the number of active Diameter Gx sessions in session profile changes.

kpi_info.title: SM_ACT_DIA_CONN
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active Diameter connections to the server per session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a Diameter connection to a server is established or closed per session profile.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_S_GW
kpi_info.use: This counter is obsolete and not updated. It is replaced by counter m3046c0013. This gauge contains the number of active S-GW sessions for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when an active S-GW session is created.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_P_GW
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active P-GW PDN connections. The index is a stat collection index stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when a P-GW PDN connection is activated. Decremented when a P-GW PDN connection is deactivated.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_SAE_GW
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active SAE-GW PDN connections. The index is a stat collection index stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when a SAE-GW PDN connection is activated. Decremented when a SAE-GW PDN connection is deactivated.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_GGSN
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active GGSN PDN connections. The index is a stat collection index stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when a GGSN PDN connection is activated. Decremented when a GGSN PDN connection is deactivated.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_DT_SESS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of active GGSN Direct Tunnel Indication (DTI) sessions for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a GGSN Update PDP Context Request or Update PDP Context Response is received with a DTI flag or when there is any change to the DTI flag value.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_DT_TO_NONDT_SESS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of transitions from Direct Tunnel Indication (DTI) to non-DTI. UPDATED: Updated when there is a transition from a DTI to a non-DTI session.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_DT_BEAR
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active GGSN Direct Tunnel Indication (DTI) sessions for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a GGSN Update PDP Context Request or Update PDP Context Response is received with a DTI flag or when there is any change to the DTI flag value. Updated also when direct tunnel session is greated over Gn interface to P-GW

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_DT_TO_NONDT_BEAR
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of transitions from Direct Tunnel Indication (DTI) to non-DTI. UPDATED: Updated when there is a transition from a DTI to a non-DTI session.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_ACT_GGSN
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed GGSN PDN connection activations. UPDATED: Updated when a GGSN PDN connection activation fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_IPV6_DYN
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions using dynamic IPv6 addresses. UPDATED: Updated when a session using a dynamic IPv6 address is created or deleted.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_ACT_MAN_REST_RATE
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of rejected PDN connection activations when PDN connection activation fails for imposing specified restriction rate for session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a PDN connection activation fails for imposing manual restriction rate.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_SESS_ACT_S_GW
kpi_info.use: This counter is obsolete and not updated. It is replaced by counter m3046c0014. This counter contains the number of successful S-GW session activations for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a S-GW session is successfully activated.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_ACT_S_GW
kpi_info.use: This counter is obsolete and not updated. It is replaced by counter m3046c0015. This counter contains the number of failed S-GW session activations. UPDATED: Updated when a S-GW session activation fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_SESS_ACT_P_GW
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful P-GW PDN connection activations for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a P-GW PDN connection is successfully activated.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_ACT_P_GW
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed P-GW PDN connection activations. UPDATED: Updated when a P-GW PDN connection activation fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_SESS_ACT_GGSN
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful GGSN PDN connection activations for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a GGSN PDN connection is successfully activated.

kpi_info.title: SM_SESS_TIMER_EXPIRY
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of PDN connections deleted by PDN connection timer expiry. UPDATED: Updated when the PDN connection timer expires and the PDN connection is deleted.

kpi_info.title: SM_DOWNLINK_BYTES
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of downlink bytes. UPDATED: Updated for each communication event between the user plane and the control plane entities in Flexi NG. Such an event occurs whenever a bearer is updated or deleted, or the charging threshold or event trigger is met. The counter is not updated in real time. For more detailed and real-time user plane statistics per session profile, see the 3072 measurement group.

kpi_info.title: SM_UPLINK_BYTES
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of uplink bytes. UPDATED: Updated for each communication event between the user plane and the control plane entities in Flexi NG. Such an event occurs whenever a bearer is updated or deleted, or the charging threshold or event trigger is met. The counter is not updated in real time. For more detailed and real-time user plane statistics per session profile, see the 3072 measurement group.

kpi_info.title: SM_DOWNLINK_PACKETS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of downlink packets. UPDATED: Updated for each communication event between the user plane and the control plane entities in Flexi NG. Such an event occurs whenever a bearer is updated or deleted, or the charging threshold or event trigger is met. The counter is not updated in real time. For more detailed and real-time user plane statistics per session profile, see the 3072 measurement group.

kpi_info.title: SM_UPLINK_PACKETS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of uplink packets. UPDATED: Updated for each communication event between the user plane and the control plane entities in Flexi NG. Such an event occurs whenever a bearer is updated or deleted, or the charging threshold or event trigger is met. The counter is not updated in real time. For more detailed and real-time user plane statistics per session profile, see the 3072 measurement group.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_SEC_SESS_DURATIONS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of seconds of the PDN connection durations. UPDATED: Updated when the PDN connection has been deactivated successfully.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_DIA_GY_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed Diameter Gy active sessions for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a Diameter Gy active session fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_DIA_GY_SESS_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of initiated Diameter Gy sessions for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a Diameter Gy active session is initiated.

kpi_info.title: SM_DIA_GY_CONTINUE_OFFLINE
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of sessions converted from online charging to offline charging. UPDATED: Updated when a session is converted from online charging to offline charging.

kpi_info.title: SM_ACT_SESS_RAT_HRPD
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions using access type HRPD. UPDATED: Updated when the number of sessions that use access type HRPD changes.

kpi_info.title: SM_ACT_SESS_RAT_EHRPD
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active sessions using access type eHRPD. UPDATED: Updated when the number of sessions that use access type eHRPD changes.

kpi_info.title: SM_HOST_ROUTE_ADV_START
kpi_info.use: This counter indicates how many IP addresses Flexi NG has started to advertise with host-based routing. UPDATED: Updated every time Flexi NG starts to advertise an IP address with host-based routing.

kpi_info.title: SM_HOST_ROUTE_ADV_STOP
kpi_info.use: This counter indicates how many IP addresses Flexi NG has stopped advertising with host-based routing. UPDATED: Updated every time Flexi NG stops advertising an IP address with host-based routing.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_DEDIC_BEAR_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful bearer activations for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a dedicated bearer activation succeeds.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_DEDIC_BEAR_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed bearer activations for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a dedicated bearer activation fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_APN_OVER_TRIGGERS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of all APN override triggers. UPDATED: Updated when a trigger for the APN override procedure occurs and refers to the statistics of the session profile linked by the initial APN. The counter is updated only with the APN override feature but not with APN selection based on the subscriber's IMSI. The counter is incremented every time an Access-Request/CCR-I is sent out so as to request a new APN from Radius/PCRF, or when a new APN is selected based on charging characteristics.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_APN_OVER_TRIGGERS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed attempts to retrieve a valid overriding APN. UPDATED: Updated in any invalid case which prevents Flexi NG from selecting a new AP, when a trigger for the APN override procedure occurs. This counter refers to the statistics of the session profile linked by the initial APN. The counter is only updated with the APN override feature but not with APN selection based on the subscriber's IMSI and charging characteristics. The counter is incremented every time when APN override was requested from RADIUS server or PCRF, but Called-Station-ID AVP in Access-Accept or CCA-I does not contain a valid APN, or the message indicates rejection by RADIUS server or PCRF.

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_APN_OVER_ESTABLISH
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful session establishments via an overriding APN. UPDATED: Updated when a PDN connection triggered by the APN override procedure is successfully established. It refers to the statistics of the session profile linked by the overriding (final) APN. The counter is updated only with the APN override feature but not with APN selection based on the subscriber's IMSI.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_APN_OVER_ESTABLISH
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed session establishments via an overriding APN. UPDATED: Updated when a PDN connection triggered by the APN override procedure fails to be established in the selected new APN. It refers to the statistics of the session profile linked by the overriding (final) APN. The counter is updated only with the APN override feature but not with APN selection based on the subscriber's IMSI. The counter is not increased in case the PDN connection activation fails before the new APN has been selected based on the APN override.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_SESS_DIA_S6B_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed Diameter S6b active sessions for each session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a Diameter S6b active session fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_DIA_S6B_SESS_ACT
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active Diameter S6b sessions stored in a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when the number of active Diameter S6b sessions in a session profile changes.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_OF_DYN_IPV6_SES_REQ
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of dynamic IPv6 requests received for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a dynamic IPv6 PDP context request is received.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_OF_DYN_IPV6_SES_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful dynamic IPv6 response sent for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a dynamic IPv6 PDP context response is successfully sent.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_OF_DYN_IPV4_SES_REQ
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of dynamic IPv4 requests received for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a dynamic IPv4 PDP context request is received.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_OF_DYN_IPV4_SES_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful dynamic IPv4 response sent for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a dynamic IPv4 PDP context response is successfully sent.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_OF_DYN_DS_SES_REQ
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of dynamic dual stack requests received for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a dynamic dual stack PDP context request is received.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_OF_DYN_DS_SES_ACT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful dynamic dual stack response sent for a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when a dynamic dual stack PDP context response is successfully sent.

kpi_info.title: SM_DIA_GY_FAILOVER_CONT_TIMER
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of subscriber sessions deleted upon expiration of failover continue timer. UPDATED: Updated when the failover continue timer expires and the subscriber session is deleted.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_SESS_RAT_WLAN
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the amount of active sessions using the WLAN radio access type UPDATED: This gauge is decremented when a session update message containing a radio access type other than WLAN is received or when a previously established session with the WLAN radio access type is deactivated

kpi_info.title: SM_SUCC_BEAR_MOD_NG_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of successful GTPv1/v2 NG-initiated bearer modifications towards Access Network per session profile. UPDATED: Updated when the NG-initiated bearer modification has been done successfully.

kpi_info.title: SM_FAIL_BEAR_MOD_NG_INIT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of failed GTPv1/v2 NG-initiated bearer modifications towards Access Network per session profile. UPDATED: Updated when the NG-initiated bearer modification fails.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_P_GW
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active P-GW bearers. The index is a stat collection index stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when a P-GW bearer is created. Decremented when a P-GW bearer is deleted.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_SAE_GW
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active SAE-GW bearers. The index is a stat collection index stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when a SAE-GW bearer is created. Decremented when a SAE-GW bearer is deleted.

kpi_info.title: SM_NBR_ACT_BEAR_GGSN
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active GGSN bearers. The index is a stat collection index stored in the session profile. UPDATED: Incremented when a GGSN bearer is created. Decremented when a GGSN bearer is deleted.

kpi_info.title: SM_DIA_GY_SESS_ACT
kpi_info.use: This gauge contains the number of active Diameter Gy sessions stored in a session profile. UPDATED: Updated when the number of active Diameter Gy sessions within the session profile changes.
